name: Prettier - Code Formatter
author: Prettier
description: An opinionated code formatter. It enforces a consistent style by parsing your code and re-printing it with its own rules.

name: Python IntelliSense (Pylance)
author: Microsoft
description: Provides rich support for the Python language, including features such as IntelliSense, linting, debugging, and code navigation.

name: ESLint
author: Microsoft
description: Integrates ESLint JavaScript linter into your workspace. Finds and fixes problems in your JavaScript code.

author: GitKraken
description: Supercharge the Git capabilities built into CodeStation. Visualize code authorship at a glance via Git blame annotations and code lens.

name: Docker
author: Microsoft
description: Makes it easy to create, manage, and debug containerized applications.

name: Live Server
author: Ritwick Dey
description: Launch a development local Server with live reload feature for static & dynamic pages.

name: Markdown All in One
author: yzhang
description: All you need for Markdown (keyboard shortcuts, table of contents, auto preview and more).

name: Black Formatter
author: Microsoft
description: Formatting support for Python files using the 'black' formatter.
